忇字的基本解释

忇
lè
功大。

忇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lè］
［《玉篇》盧得切］
(1)功劳大。
(2)思。

忇字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　忇； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页375第04
【五音集韻】盧則切，音勒。【玉篇】功大也。又一本【玉篇】思也。◎按《說文》止有㔹字，从十。解曰：材十人也。玉篇从十，从心?見，然于从十者，則訓曰材十人也。于从心者，則一本訓曰功大也。一本訓曰思也。蓋《說文》之後，廣益之字原多，而从十之㔹，與从心之忇，應必有別。緣傳寫者譌，註釋者又譌，而廣韻，集韻遂棄此字。至韓孝彥五音集韻收此字，而註曰功大，又註曰材十人也，則又將从心之忇，混于从十之㔹矣。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　忇; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 375 04
【Pentagram Rhyme】Lu Zeqie, Yinle. [Jade articles] Great merit. Another 【Jade Chapter】Thinking too. ◎According to "Said Wen", there are only 㔹 characters, from ten. Xie said: There are ten talents. From the tenth chapter of the jade chapter, you can see from the heart, but if you follow the tenth, then the ten people are trained. For those who are from the heart, they have great skills. One book says thinking. After the "Shuowen" was built, there were many characters in Guangyi, and from ten to 㔹, and from the heart to 忇, there must be a difference. Yuan Chuan was written by Jia, and the annotator was also Jia, while Guang Yun and Ji Yun abandoned this character. When Han Xiaoyan collected this character in the rhyme of the five-tone collection, he noted that he had great merit, and he also noted that there are ten talents.
